title: Au micro
overview: In 2024/2025, the new UEFA Champions League format, with even more matches, will be broadcast in full on CANAL+ channels. With this in mind, to strengthen its team of commentators, CANAL+ has launched a search for a new voice to commentate on football on its channels. An exceptional recruitment process, in several stages, open for the first time to all football fans. Competitors aged 18 to 64, from all professional and social categories.
